Text:
Thanks for all these movies! Anyway you can do Iron Man 1&2? I'd appreciate it!

A/V 10/10

Perfect RIP! and good bitrate. Download was fast.

Thanks!
I have an iPad 3, is there a real noticeable difference between the 720p and 1080p versions on the small screen guys? Many thanks

@Mamba4ever i also have the iPad 3 an tasted a music video in 720 & 1080 and in some scenes u can notice a little tiny iny difference but with the iPad at 5 in of the eyes. But the file size difference doesn't worth the extra space. I'll stick with 720, most of all cause i have the Apple TV2 (only 720).
aaah cheers for the prompt replies, will stick with the 720p versions for now then :)
